meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7840.

div.div: Alan Dunn game 1. WE ASKED: Dr. Travis Stork.

td.p: Alan Dunn, a software development manager from Johns Creek, Georgia
Ryan Vesledahl, a catastrophe modeler from Minneapolis, Minnesota
Alex Schmidt, a writer and comedian from Pasadena, California (whose 4-day cash winnings total $92,880)

tr.td: C & C ALLITERATION FACTORY
MOUNTAINS
SACK TIME
EDUCATION
LIBROS EN ESPAÑOL
FRIENDS OFF THE COURT

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Pushing the CC button on your car activates this, perfect for long trips on the open highway')

Ryan
Alan

SCULPTURE
3-SYLLABLE WORDS
LEGAL LATIN
"TIME" FOR A TUNE
MODERN HEALTH
(Travis Stork: I'm Dr. Travis Stork of The Doctors with...) (Travis Stork: Clues about how to stay well amid issues our ancestors never faced.)
